testcase.name: test_voice_settings_endpoint_defaults

failure.message:
AssertionError: Expected voice_model='emma', got 'idera' assert 'idera' == 'emma'
- emma + idera

testcase.failure: backend/tests/test_iteration52_voice_fixes.py:48: in test_voice_settings_endpoint_defaults assert voice_model == "emma", f"Expected voice_model='emma', got '{voice_model}'" E AssertionError: Expected voice_model='emma', got 'idera' E assert 'idera' == 'emma' E E - emma E + idera

testcase.name: test_briefing_generate_uses_emma_default

failure.message: AssertionError: Briefing still using 'nova' voice assert 'nova' != 'nova'
